query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS talentPool (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  employerId INT NOT NULL,
  candidateId INT NOT NULL,
  tags JSON,
  notes TEXT,
  matchScore INT,
  addedFromJobId INT,
  status ENUM('active', 'contacted', 'hired', 'not_interested') DEFAULT 'active',
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_employer_candidate (employerId, candidateId)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HwZw1vuDqLodBY.root --database hjcHA4SjAwhM6aP28vcAkH --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS talentPool (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  employerId INT NOT NULL,
  candidateId INT NOT NULL,
  tags JSON,
  notes TEXT,
  matchScore INT,
  addedFromJobId INT,
  status ENUM('active', 'contacted', 'hired', 'not_interested') DEFAULT 'active',
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_employer_candidate (employerId, candidateId)
)
